title: Bug 2940: Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Updating of checkboxes in the Export Zip feature is taking a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case). The expected behavior is that a busy cursor should be shown during the update.
OB: Checkbox state update takes a long time
EB: A busy cursor should be shown during checkbox state update
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature
2. Observe the checkbox state update
3. Check if a busy cursor is shown during the update
